name: The Failure Of The Hero's Party Solos The Infinite Dungeon
name_original: The Failure Of The Hero's Party Solos The Infinite Dungeon
description: There once was an adventurer with the power to conquer death. Sadly he was a failure. Kicked from the hero's party, he decides to venture into the infinite dungeon to become the strongest warrior and take back his place in the hero's party.
